verses.verse: <S%G5023>These<s%> things have I <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to you, that you should not be offended. <S%G4624><s%>

And <S%G5023>these<s%> things will they <S%G4160>do<s%> to you, <S%G3754>because<s%> they have not <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> me.

But <S%G5023>these<s%> things have I <S%G2980>told<s%> you, that <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G5610>time<s%> shall <S%G2064>come,<s%> you may <S%G3421>remember<s%> that I <S%G2036>told<s%> you of them. And <S%G5023>these<s%> things I <S%G2036>said<s%> not to you <S%G1537>at<s%> the <S%G746>beginning,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I was with you.
But <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G5217>go<s%> my way to him that <S%G3992>sent<s%> me; and <S%G3762>none<s%> of you <S%G2065>asks<s%> me, <S%G4226>Where<s%> <S%G5217>go<s%> you?
But <S%G3754>because<s%> I have <S%G2980>said<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things to you, <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> has <S%G4137>filled<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> heart. <S%G2588><s%>

<S%G235>Nevertheless<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you the <S%G225>truth;<s%> It is <S%G4851>expedient<s%> for you that I <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G565>away:<s%> for <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G565>go<s%> not <S%G565>away,<s%> the <S%G3875>Comforter<s%> will not <S%G2064>come<s%> to you; but <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G4198>depart,<s%> I will <S%G3992>send<s%> him to you.
And when he is <S%G2064>come,<s%> he will <S%G1651>reprove<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> of <S%G266>sin,<s%> and of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> and of judgment: <S%G2920><s%>
Of <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G4100>believe<s%> not <S%G1519>on<s%> me;

I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things to <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, but you cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G941>bear<s%> them now. <S%G737><s%>

However, <S%G3752>when<s%> he, the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G225>truth,<s%> is <S%G2064>come,<s%> he will <S%G3594>guide<s%> you <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G225>truth:<s%> for he shall not <S%G2980>speak<s%> of <S%G1438>himself;<s%> but whatever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> he shall hear, <S%G191><s%> that shall he <S%G2980>speak:<s%> and he will <S%G312>show<s%> you things to come. <S%G2064><s%>
He shall <S%G1392>glorify<s%> me: for he shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> of <S%G1699>mine,<s%> and shall show <S%G312><s%> it to you.

<S%G3956>All<s%> things that the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> are <S%G1699>mine:<s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> I, that he shall <S%G2983>take<s%> of <S%G1699>mine,<s%> and shall show <S%G312><s%> it to you.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> some of his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G240>themselves,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> is <S%G5124>this<s%> that he <S%G3004>said<s%> to us, A <S%G3397>little<s%> while, and you shall not <S%G2334>see<s%> me: and <S%G3825>again,<s%> a <S%G3397>little<s%> while, and you shall <S%G3700>see<s%> me: and, <S%G3754>Because<s%> I <S%G5217>go<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father?<s%>

They <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> is <S%G5124>this<s%> that he <S%G3004>said,<s%> A <S%G3397>little<s%> while ? we <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1492><s%> <S%G1492>tell<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> he <S%G2980>said.<s%>

<S%G3767>Now<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> that they were <S%G2309>desirous<s%> to <S%G2065>ask<s%> him, and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, Do you <S%G2212>inquire<s%> <S%G3326>among<s%> <S%G240>yourselves<s%> of that I <S%G2036>said,<s%> A <S%G3397>little<s%> while, and you shall not <S%G2334>see<s%> me: and <S%G3825>again,<s%> a <S%G3397>little<s%> while, and you shall <S%G3700>see<s%> me?

<S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That you shall <S%G2799>weep<s%> and <S%G2354>lament,<s%> but the <S%G2889>world<s%> shall <S%G5463>rejoice:<s%> and you shall be <S%G3076>sorrowful,<s%> but <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> shall be <S%G1096>turned<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> joy. <S%G5479><s%>

A <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> she is in <S%G5088>travail<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> her <S%G5610>hour<s%> is <S%G2064>come:<s%> but as <S%G3752>soon<s%> as she is <S%G1080>delivered<s%> of the <S%G3813>child,<s%> she <S%G3421>remembers<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> the <S%G2347>anguish,<s%> for <S%G5479>joy<s%> that a <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>

And you <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow:<s%> but I will <S%G3700>see<s%> you <S%G3825>again,<s%> and <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> shall <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> and <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G142>takes<s%> from you.

Till now <S%G2193><s%> <S%G737><s%> have you <S%G154>asked<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> in my <S%G3686>name:<s%> <S%G154>ask,<s%> and you shall <S%G2983>receive,<s%> that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> may be full. <S%G4137><s%>

<S%G5023>These<s%> things have I <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to you in <S%G3942>proverbs:<s%> but the <S%G5610>time<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> I shall <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> to you in <S%G3942>proverbs,<s%> but I shall <S%G312>show<s%> you <S%G3954>plainly<s%> of the Father. <S%G3962><s%>
<S%G1722>At<s%> that <S%G2250>day<s%> you shall <S%G154>ask<s%> in my <S%G3686>name:<s%> and I <S%G3004>say<s%> not to you, that I will <S%G2065>pray<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> for you:

For the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G5368>loves<s%> you, <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G5368>loved<s%> me, and have <S%G4100>believed<s%> that I <S%G1831>came<s%> out from God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G3568>Now<s%> are we <S%G1492>sure<s%> that you <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things, and <S%G2192>need<s%> <S%G5532><s%> not that <S%G5100>any<s%> man should <S%G2065>ask<s%> you: by <S%G5129>this<s%> we <S%G4100>believe<s%> that you <S%G1831>came<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> from <S%G2316>God.<s%>
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, Do you <S%G737>now<s%> believe? <S%G4100><s%>

<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> <S%G2532>yes,<s%> is <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2064>come,<s%> that you shall be <S%G4650>scattered,<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> man to his <S%G2398>own,<s%> and shall <S%G863>leave<s%> me <S%G3441>alone:<s%> and yet I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G3441>alone,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> is with me.

<S%G5023>These<s%> things I have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to you, that in me you might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1515>peace.<s%> In the <S%G2889>world<s%> you shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation:<s%> but be of good <S%G2293>cheer;<s%> I have <S%G3528>overcome<s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>
